laboratory_examinations.findings: LFTs peaked with AST 187, ALT 491, AlkPhos 178, Total bilirubin 4.2 (normal range not specified).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: LFTs were normal at admission but peaked at the mentioned values.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: MRCP (MRI of abdomen with and without contrast)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Mild intrahepatic bile duct dilation, gallbladder filled with stones, 5 mm filling defect in distal CBD consistent with a stone.
